鞾字的基本解释

鞾
xuē
同“靴”。

鞾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xuē］
同“靴1”。亦作“韡2”。
[②]［wěi］
同“韡1”。
光明貌。参见“鞾2燭”、“鞾2鞾”。

鞾字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【革字部】　鞾； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1391第40
【唐韻】許?切【集韻】呼?切【韻會】許茄切，?音?。【說文】鞮屬。【廣韻】鞾，鞋鞾。趙武靈王所服。【釋名】跨也。兩足各以一跨騎也。【廣韻】亦作靴。【集韻】又作??㞜。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【The Department of Leather Characters】　鞾; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 1391 No. 40
[Tang Yun] Xu? Cut [Ji Yun] Hu? Cut [Yunhui] Xu Qiqie, "Yin?" [Said the text] Mochi. [Guang Yun] Yan, shoes. Taken by King Zhao Wuling. [Release name] Cross also. Each of the two legs rides on a straddle. [Guangyun] Also used as boots. [Ji Yun] also called?? 㞜.
